name: libp2p-website

scripts.build:js: browserify --noparse=jquery js/{index,implementations,bundles,media}.js -p [ factor-bundle -o static/js/index.js -o static/js/implementations.js -o static/js/bundles.js -o static/js/media.js ] -o static/js/common.js
scripts.watch:js: watchify --noparse=jquery js/{index,implementations,bundles,media}.js -p [ factor-bundle -o static/js/index.js -o static/js/implementations.js -o static/js/bundles.js -o static/js/media.js ] -o static/js/common.js --debug
